title: Just Another Immigrant
resume: Romesh Ranganathan, one of the most popular stand-ups in the UK, uproots his entire family – his supportive wife, three kids, his Sri Lankan mother and his eccentric uncle – and immigrates to Los Angeles in this comedic docuseries. In addition to his efforts to rebuild a life from scratch, Ranganathan books himself an audacious U.S. gig – the 6,000-seat Greek Theater – with only three months to sell it out. Follow the hilariously true-life adventures of this modern immigrant family and the obstacles of making it in today’s America.
